If you are having thoughts of suicide, call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 (TALK) or go to  http://SpeakingOfSuicide.com/resources  for a list of additional resources.

This is an essential step in providing critical resources to those in emotional distress. Read more about this bill here --> http://stewart.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/stewart-designates-9-8-8-for-suicide-hotline-dialing-code …

Truly honored to lead on the Utah-based initiative to get a three-digit, easy-to-remember, dialing code for the #NationalSuicidePreventionLifeline. Suicide hits close to home with an average of two Utahns taking their life every day.

Just introduced the #NationalSuicideHotlineDesignationAct with leading co-sponsors @teammoulton, @RepEBJ, & #RepGianforte. This bi-partisan legislation designates 9-8-8 as the universal telephone number for the National Suicide Prevention & Mental Health Crisis hotline system.

Utah is home to around 185,000 college students. Many of whom rely on financial aid & student loans to pay for tuition.
